USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t Struct Reference
[CDC Class Device Mode Driver]

#include <CDC.h>

   }   LineEncoding

Detailed Description

Class state structure. An instance of this structure should be made for each CDC interface within the user application, and passed to each of the CDC class driver functions as the CDCInterfaceInfo parameter. This stores each CDC interface's configuration and state information.

Field Documentation

uint32_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::BaudRateBPS

Baud rate of the virtual serial port, in bits per second

uint8_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::CharFormat

Character format of the virtual serial port, a value from the CDCDevice_CDC_LineCodingFormats_t enum

struct { ... } USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::Config

Config data for the USB class interface within the device. All elements in this section must be set or the interface will fail to enumerate and operate correctly.

uint8_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::ControlInterfaceNumber

Interface number of the CDC control interface within the device

struct { ... } USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::ControlLineStates
uint8_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::DataBits

Bits of data per character of the virtual serial port

bool USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::DataINEndpointDoubleBank
uint8_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::DataINEndpointNumber

Endpoint number of the CDC interface's IN data endpoint

uint16_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::DataINEndpointSize

Size in bytes of the CDC interface's IN data endpoint

bool USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::DataOUTEndpointDoubleBank
uint8_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::DataOUTEndpointNumber

Indicates if the CDC interface's IN data endpoint should use double banking Endpoint number of the CDC interface's OUT data endpoint

uint16_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::DataOUTEndpointSize

Size in bytes of the CDC interface's OUT data endpoint

uint8_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::DeviceToHost

Control line states from the device to host, as a set of CDC_CONTROL_LINE_IN_* masks.

uint8_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::HostToDevice

Control line states from the host to device, as a set of CDC_CONTROL_LINE_OUT_* masks.

struct { ... } USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::LineEncoding
bool USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::NotificationEndpointDoubleBank
uint8_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::NotificationEndpointNumber

Indicates if the CDC interface's OUT data endpoint should use double banking Endpoint number of the CDC interface's IN notification endpoint, if used

uint16_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::NotificationEndpointSize

Size in bytes of the CDC interface's IN notification endpoint, if used

uint8_t USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::ParityType

Parity setting of the virtual serial port, a value from the CDCDevice_LineCodingParity_t enum

struct { ... } USB_ClassInfo_CDC_Device_t::State

State data for the USB class interface within the device. All elements in this section are reset to their defaults when the interface is enumerated.
